message: Let's start fair. I'll take most of the money this round, but I promise to be more generous in the future if you accept.
I understand you want a larger share, but letting the money depreciate hurts us both. I'm proposing a much better split this time to show I'm serious about getting a fair deal done quickly.
I'm willing to compromise. This offer is closer to your proposal, and we can avoid further losses from inflation.
